Name: Witch's Curse Counter
Story Background: Witches weave dark curses, turning enemy spells against their owners and afflicting them with deadly hexes.
Ability: Counter target spell. Then, its controller gains a curse for three turns, reducing their strength and stamina by half.
Appearance Description: A cauldron bubbles as dark smoke rises, swirling around the target spell and inflicting a withering curse on its caster.
